integration-in-ihren-workflow.intro:
Integrate online appointment booking via Bookingflix into your business. Bookingflix supports you in organising your appointments so that you have more time for your actual tasks.
Your customers will also appreciate this online service. Because making arrangements by phone costs time and can be very annoying. It's easy, digital, modern and therefore better!

infos.headline: Appointment booking outside your business hours
infos.text: Booking appointments at any time! With Bookingflix online appointment calendar it is possible to accept bookings outside your business hours. This allows you to reach more customers and increase your sales. Many customers - especially in the young and middle generation - prefer online booking to booking by phone.

infos.headline: Real-Time Appointment Calendar
infos.text: Only free appointment times are ever displayed to your customers. Once an appointment has been booked by a customer, the appointment is no longer available. This prevents double bookings and you always have an overview of your current workload. In addition, you can view the appointment entries on all stationary and mobile devices.

infos.headline: Manual appointment booking and modification
infos.text: Not every customer wants to or can book an appointment online. Therefore, enter telephone appointment bookings manually in the dashboard. You can also make changes or cancel appointments manually here.

infos.headline: Synchronization with existing calendars
infos.text: With Bookingflix, you can easily and fully automatically synchronise your booking calendar with your own calendar from popular providers such as Google, Microsoft or Apple. This allows you to transfer the booked appointments to your existing standard calendars. But also block already booked appointments of your own calendar automatically in the Bookingflix booking calendar.

infos.headline: Automatic appointment confirmation
infos.text: With Bookingflix you no longer need to check your calendar yourself. If a free appointment was booked, you can have it confirmed immediately, completely automatically by the system. However, if you prefer to check the bookings yourself, you can also confirm new appointment bookings manually.

infos.headline: QR code for booking appointment on site
infos.text: In your Bookingflix account you will find an automatically generated QR code for each appointment calendar, which leads directly to your booking website. You can print this out and display it in your shop window to also enable easy appointment booking on site, for example as part of Click & Meet. Your customers simply scan the QR code with their smartphone and can book an appointment with you without any detours.

infos.headline: Log attendance
infos.text: Every appointment booked through Bookingflix has an appointment QR code. This allows you to check in and check out your customers, giving you an accurate overview of your customer's reliability and your company's capacity utilisation.
